extendedInfo.description: Bring the magic of Walt Disney World and the Disney Parks to your iPhone or iPad with the free WDW Radio Disney Podcast app. WDW Radio is the award-winning online radio show dedicated to celebrating the magic of Walt Disney World. It is brought to you by Lou Mongello, the author of the Walt Disney World Trivia books & Walt Disney World Audio Tours and host of the WDW Radio Disney podcast. PODCASTThe unofficial "Walt Disney World Information Station," WDW Radio has been named Best Travel Podcast for 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 and 2012, and you can easily stream the show right to your mobile device and subscribe for FREE in iTunes! This family-friendly show covers Walt Disney World news, Disney vacation planning, Disney World reviews, Disney trivia, Walt Disney World dining, Disney hotels, history, fun facts, contests and features exclusive interviews with Disney Imagineers, executives, celebrities and more. BLOGEasily read our Disney blog featuring Disney news, Disney World reviews, Disney World dining, Walt Disney World vacation planning advice, tips, tricks, history, Disney photos, and more! Learn more about all four Disney parks, including the Magic Kingdom, Epcot, Disney's Hollywood Studios, and Disney's Animal Kingdom, as well as Disney's Blizzard Beach and Disney's Typhoon Lagoon water parks, Downtown Disney, and advice on Disney World dining and Disney resort hotelsVIDEOSGet easy access to videos from Walt Disney World! Disney attractions, resorts, Walt Disney World vacation planning, special events, Walt Disney World secrets and history, Disney interviews and much more LIVE BROADCASTJoin us for WDW Radio LIVE video broadcasts from in-studio and in the parks Wednesdays at 7:30pm ET! Chat real-time with Lou, special guests and other listeners!EVENTSJoin Lou and other Disney fans for Meets of the Month in Walt Disney World, as other special events around the country, on the Disney Cruise Line, in Disneyland, and more!FORUMSChat with other Disney fans in our free, online discussion forums. Get involved in the conversations, play games, and follow the latest Disney news.CONNECTConnect with Lou and the WDW Radio Disney podcast through social channels like Twitter, Facebook, our free Disney newsletter featuring Disney vacation tips, discounts, Walt Disney World information and moreSHOP Shop the WDW Radio Disney podcast online store to get the Walt Disney World Trivia Books and virtual Audio Tours of WDW WORK WITH LOU MONGELLOLou Mongello is a leading expert on Walt Disney World. He is the host and producer of the award-winning WDW Radio Disney podcast, blogger, author of Disney books and audio tours of Walt Disney World, historian and philanthropist. He is also a featured speaker who shares with businesses, associations and schools the magic of Disney and/or the power of social media. Learn how to work with LouNote that the WDW Radio Disney podcast app is a great way to enhance your Walt Disney World vacation or get Disney magic at home, but does not include Disney World wait times, or Disney World maps

reviews.title: Great way to listen on the go
reviews.comment: Tried this app out on the recommendation of a friend and I\'m glad I did.  I\'ve enjoyed listening on the computer and can now listen while traveling. The kids (18 &13) love the trivia and different facts as well. Great recommendation Scott!
reviews.author: sharry h

reviews.title: Well done app.
reviews.comment: Excellent content for Disney Fans.   The access page is very good except I can only see one page of past episodes... doesn\'t scroll or page back,  so I have to use the web site for older eps. Also,  when I pause,  the controls disappear and I can\'t seem to get them back without restarting.
reviews.author: Steven Ells

reviews.comment: The perfect app.
reviews.author: James Rouse

reviews.title: Best wdw disney app A+
reviews.comment: Lou is by far the most informative guy on wdw. Always entertaining and interesting !
reviews.author: Scott Gul

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Love the podcasts. Very informative and fun to listen to. Wish I could download the podcasts from the play store or the website without using iTunes. Listening without a wifi connection uses a lot of data.
reviews.author: Ivan Cruz

reviews.title: Lou is the best!
reviews.comment: Si happy to have this app on on android! Love listening to his shows. Just need to get archives of pod casts on here
reviews.author: david Marki

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Broken with update; tried uninstall and reinstall.  Runs super slow and then stopped responding.
reviews.author: Jonathon Dargan

reviews.title: What does this app do??
reviews.comment: The app opens and doesn\'t move from the main screen, no audio either.  What is supposed to happen????
reviews.author: Joyce Ellis

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Lou is the best and the app works flawlessly
reviews.author: James Bazan

reviews.title: WDW Radio App
reviews.comment: By far the best app I have downloaded to my phone and I have quite a few. If your a Lou Mongello fan or a Disney fan this app is your ticket to the World. Every phone, iPod, iPad, mp3 player should come with this app. Its interactive, informative and it\'s Box People friendly!
reviews.author: Stuart Sternberg

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Lou does a great job at getting all the latest Disney news to his fans. Get all the WDW Radio info you want with this awesome app.
reviews.author: Solomn Banks

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Everything works fast & smooth... great job by Lou and his team.
reviews.author: Mike Wendt

reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
reviews.comment: Been waiting ages for this. So pleased it\'s come out for android too. It\'s brilliant!!!!
reviews.author: Vikki Wells

reviews.comment: Great app !
reviews.author: Brian Burke

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Enough said
reviews.author: Darren Shevchuk

reviews.title: PERFECT App For A PERFECT Show!!
reviews.comment: Whether you are a member of the Lou Crew and WDW Radio family or not, download this app for easy access to anything and everything WDW Radio.  Thanks much Lou and Team!
reviews.author: Nathaniel Ehlers

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Thank you Lou! Thank you for making this available for android!  Great job!
reviews.author: Kristine Banas

reviews.title: I love Lou but...
reviews.comment: I love Lou and WDW radio, but the app is lackluster at best.
reviews.author: Chris Prall

reviews.title: no go on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Wish it worked on my Nexus but is not compatible. Love the show and will link to main page. Worked on my iPhone.
reviews.author: Wayne Johnson

reviews.title: Worth waiting for!
reviews.comment: Love this, lou!
reviews.author: Donna Sharick
